settings.label: Hidden Product Types
settings.info: Enter a comma seperated list of Product Types for which it should not be possible to view the PDP for, and which should instead redirect to the Homepage

settings.label: Max Product Quantity
settings.info: Specify the maximum quantity of any product SKU a Customer should be able to Add to Cart

settings.info: Includes tooltips, filter titles, variant and form labels

settings.label: Style
settings.info: Affects buttons and form elements

settings.label: Products per row on mobile
settings.info: Grid layout only

settings.label: Image hover effect
settings.info: Desktop only

settings.label: Disable Hover Effect on Mobile
settings.info: When enabled, hover effects will be disabled on mobile devices while keeping desktop hover behavior

settings.label: Enable Shopify Ratings & Reviews
settings.info: Install Shopify's free [Product Reviews app](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) before enabling this option.

settings.content: Use the metafield 'theme.cutline' to show a short description under product titles. [Learn more](https://presidiocreative.com/link/palo-alto/docs/cutline)

settings.info: Learn more about [media types](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/product-media)

settings.label: Klaviyo Subscription List ID (optional)
settings.info: Add checkbox "Subscribe to our newsletter"

settings.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
settings.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.

settings.label: Style
settings.info: Desktop only

settings.label: Show dynamic checkout button in Quick View
settings.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
Learn more about [subscriptions](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/subscriptions)

settings.label: Enable subscription selectors
settings.info: Shown on products with subscription options

settings.label: Additional subscription information
settings.info: will be shown under the selected subscription option

settings.content: Use the metafield 'theme.cutline' to show a short description under product titles. [Learn more](https://presidiocreative.com/link/palo-alto/docs/cutline)

settings.info: Display menu buttons when cart is empty

settings.label: Menu
settings.info: This menu won't show dropdown items

settings.label: Show the "Continue Shopping" button within Cart?
Show the "Continue Shopping" button within Empty Cart?
settings.info: Disabled if empty cart buttons are used

settings.label: "Continue Shopping" button link
settings.info: Default is [Collection all](/collections/all) page

settings.label: Message
settings.info: Use ||amount|| to display progress towards free shipping.

settings.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
settings.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters. [Learn more](https://presidiocreative.com/link/palo-alto/docs/free-shipping-message)

settings.label: Enable terms and conditions requirement for checkout
settings.info: This will disable the "Buy it now" button

settings.label: Checkbox label
settings.default: I agree to the terms and conditions

settings.label: Show spacer lines
settings.info: Spacer lines appear above or below certain titles for emphasis

settings.label: Show rounded corners
settings.info: Applies to images and boxed elements

settings.label: Show text shadow
settings.info: Applies to text with background image

settings.label: Menu items expanded by default
settings.info: Add multiple items seperated by comma.

settings.content: Add custom badges to the Product grid for a unique experience. [Learn more](https://presidiocreative.com/link/palo-alto/docs/badges)

settings.label: Show Custom badge on Product Card
Show Custom badge on Product Page
Enable color swatches on the Product grid
Enable color swatches on the Product pages
Style
settings.info: Set up swatches for your product color variant options. [Learn more](https://presidiocreative.com/link/palo-alto/docs/swatches)

settings.label: Enable infinity scroll
settings.info: It applies to the Collection, Blog and Search pages

settings.label: Menu
settings.info: This menu won't show dropdown items

settings.label: Number of suggested terms
settings.info: Limits both the suggested search terms menu and collections menu items

settings.content: Icon appears while site is loading
Note that cart and checkout totals will always show the currency code, and itemized, unit, and installment prices will not.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.content: Use a dynamic source with the metafield 'theme.size_chart' to connect your size chart with specific product page(s). Note that using a metafield will automatically overwrite the Page input below. [Set up your metafield(s)](/admin/settings/custom_data)

settings.label: Page
settings.info: Note that this setting will apply to all your products. If you wish to have a size chart for specific products, connect a dynamic source using the instructions above.

settings.label: Message
settings.default: You are accessing our website for the United Kingdom. Would you like to continue on this website?

settings.label: GSV ID
settings.info: Leave blank to disable.  Add multiple GSV IDs on separate lines.

settings.label: Custom Enabled Payment Types
settings.info: Comma-separated list of payment types (e.g., amazon, apple_pay, visa). Leave empty to use default payment types.

settings.label: Partner ID
settings.info: Leave blank to disable.

settings.label: Clarip Cookie Manager ID
settings.info: Leave blank to disable.

settings.label: PieEye DSRP ID
settings.info: Leave blank to disable.

settings.label: Extole Branded Domain JS
settings.info: Leave blank to disable.

settings.label: Custom API endpoint to fetch customer loyalty

settings.content: Hide the followoing elements within the Theme Editor

settings.label: CSS selectors
settings.info: Specify a comma seperated list of CSS selectors to be hidden.
